content: लीलावत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Sportive, playful. {@--2@} Beautiful, graceful. --ती {@--1@} A charming or handsome woman. {@--2@} An amorous or wanton woman. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a wellknown mathematical work by Bhāskarāchārya. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of the demon Maya.
